issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: HDFS fsck continues to report all blocks present when DataNode is restarted with empty data directories

comments.body: The attached patch adds the suggested fix and a test to verify it. I decided not to test against {{fsck}}, because it's just a symptom and not the root cause. Therefore, I relocated the test under "DataNode" to show that removing BlockPools offline should work as expected.
It looks strange that I have added {{André Frimberger}} to the contributor role but still can't assign this JIRA to him, :(.

I added Andre to the contributors 2 role for the HDFS project, assigning.

Hi [~linyiqun],

thanks for testing my patch. I respected your suggestions and created the final patch. Would it make sense to backport the changes to 2.6 and 2.7?
